Title: EDMDesigner
Description: Entity Data Model designer developed in C#3, VB9, WPF, XML Literal.
HomeWiki:
Some scenarii aren't supported by the first MS EDM Designer.
The goal of this project is to fix them.
You can find more in my blog (http://msmvps.com/blogs/matthieu/archive/tags/EDM+Designer/default.aspx).
